issue.title: [C++] Add EqualOptions support in SparseTensor::Equals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6393](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6393). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
SparseTensor::Equals should take EqualOptions argument as Tensor::Equals does.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6393?focusedCommentId=17045267) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
